{{cpp/title|swap{{small|(std::valarray)}}}}
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=valarray|since=c++11|
template&lt; class T &gt;
void swap( std::valarray&lt;T&gt;&amp; lhs, std::valarray&lt;T&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Specializes the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::valarray}}. Swaps the contents of {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}}. Calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|valarrays whose contents to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;valarray&gt;

void print(auto rem, const std::valarray&lt;int&gt;&amp; v)
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; rem &lt;&lt; '{';
    for (char sep[]{0, ' ', 0}; auto elem : v)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; sep &lt;&lt; elem, *sep = ',';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "}\n";
}

int main()
{
    std::valarray x{3, 1, 4, 1, 5};
    std::valarray y{2, 7, 1, 8};

    print("Before swap:\n" "x: ", x);
    print("y: ", y);

    std::swap(x, y);

    print("After swap:\n" "x: ", x);
    print("y: ", y);
}
|output=
Before swap:
x: {3, 1, 4, 1, 5}
y: {2, 7, 1, 8}
After swap:
x: {2, 7, 1, 8}
y: {3, 1, 4, 1, 5}
}}
